name: Mystica: The Ninth Society
description: Explore unique locations, clear dark dungeons, slay powerful creatures, and uncover a world enriched with a fascinating lore and history. Go alone or party up for a more enjoyable experience. The story is yours to write in this open world, massively multilayer adventure.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or better Processor: 800 MHz 32-bit CPU or better Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 8.0 Compatible video card or better DirectX: Version 8.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 8.0 Compatible sound card or better
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or better Processor: 1500 MHz 64-bit CPU or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible video card or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 8.0 Compatible sound card or better
